title: LIGHTIN' UP That Sky
body_text:
MidSeason Main Event!
EDWARDS against K. ADAMS!
And just when it seemed like the preview was too difficult to describe ...
HOLY SH*T
! Will this clash of titans go in the
EastCoastDodgeball
record books as one of the all-time barbaric and sadistic wars in the nearly-three year existence of the sport. The earth was indeed knocked off its axis - legendary performers of the game and to many, unquestionably the most dominant captains in all of ECD history fearlessly collided for the very first time ever.
Michael Edwards
one-on-one with
Kevin Adams
!
The inaugural round of the feverishly-awaited confrontation released more inner anger than that of a nationwide genocide - sick for sure, but reality it was. And how about the nail-biting K. Adams/Tronolone Game 1 conclusion? Man, it was an all-out war with soldiers nearly decapitated on the sidelines.
Following the close game-ending encounter,
PLAYER of the Year '07
Adams used all the momentum to atomic bomb the enemy into near surrender. As the night wore on, things got so out of hand for the EDWARDS Army that even his very own allies were taking out their aggression on each other! Plus, every opportunity at a team regeneration either fell short and into the hands of an adversary or was expertly blocked by members of the "Adams Assault". Nothing seemed to work for the "The Crazy One".
Flash Results by Game
Adams: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6
Edwards: (0)
This is a shocking turn of events especially given the successful history of both men, specifically Michael Edwards.
Kevin Adams
defeated
Michael Edwards
, 6 to 0.
Move to the Music!
Big ups to ECD's own "Giant Killer" Melissa Kerr for creating the awesome music playlist to CXLV.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Kevin Adams defeated Michael Edwards, 6 - 0.
Captains Statistics
: Kevin Adams 9-2-0 / Michael Edwards 5-1-1. Adams became the first player in history to reach nine victories as captain, breaking the record of eight which he himself set at CX1. Edwards suffered his first career captains defeat, having kept his win streak for nearly a year and half.
Moments & Stars
: Michelle Mullins's nutshot on Sascha Basista; Melissa Kerr's chest smacked by a rocket-fast Kevin Adams bulletball; the "run-by" faceshot perpetrated on Juan Londono
Attendance
: 36, comprised of 30 men and 6 women. This was the 11th highest attendance in ECD history. This was the first time since DODGEBALL CX last Fall where 30 or more male competitors were present.
New Players
: Tyler Hetzel, Conor Mulholland, Zac Kent, Matthew Kent, Dillon Luis, Jared Luis, Justin Herbert, Cameron Schroeder, Haley Schroeder.
Other Notes
: This was the second shut-out in Season 15, the first of which at
DODGEBALL 142
.
Online Exclusive!
In the final week leading up to DODGEBALL CXLV, both Adams and Edwards were offered a special stipulation: the losing captain's captains career would be over. Though Edwards initially accepted such a match addition, by week's end both he and Adams mutually declined.
________________________________________
___________________
Only FIVE Remain!
DODGEBALL 146: July 12, 2008
Back to basics with the
Dodgeball Draft
#5! Plus, the colossal main event to the sizzlin' summer spectacular DODGEBALL 150 will be announced live!
DODGEBALL 147: July 19, 2008
A rivalry over 50 events in the making. It's
WALL vs. ALL 7
.
DODGEBALL 148: July 26, 2008
A special
Player's Choice Rimshot Contest
! Can Travis Mills make it three straight?
DODGEBALL 149: August 2, 2008
"The Writer" loves surprises.
DODGEBALL 150: August 9, 2008
Special Start: 5pm
The biggest one of them all and it all goes down in one month!

MidSeason Main Event!
EDWARDS against K. ADAMS!

And just when it seemed like the preview was too difficult to describe ... HOLY SH*T! Will this clash of titans go in the EastCoastDodgeball record books as one of the all-time barbaric and sadistic wars in the nearly-three year existence of the sport. The earth was indeed knocked off its axis - legendary performers of the game and to many, unquestionably the most dominant captains in all of ECD history fearlessly collided for the very first time ever. Michael Edwards one-on-one with Kevin Adams!

The inaugural round of the feverishly-awaited confrontation released more inner anger than that of a nationwide genocide - sick for sure, but reality it was. And how about the nail-biting K. Adams/Tronolone Game 1 conclusion? Man, it was an all-out war with soldiers nearly decapitated on the sidelines.

Following the close game-ending encounter, PLAYER of the Year '07 Adams used all the momentum to atomic bomb the enemy into near surrender. As the night wore on, things got so out of hand for the EDWARDS Army that even his very own allies were taking out their aggression on each other! Plus, every opportunity at a team regeneration either fell short and into the hands of an adversary or was expertly blocked by members of the "Adams Assault". Nothing seemed to work for the "The Crazy One".

Flash Results by Game
Adams: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6
Edwards: (0)

This is a shocking turn of events especially given the successful history of both men, specifically Michael Edwards.

Kevin Adams defeated Michael Edwards, 6 to 0.

Move to the Music!
Big ups to ECD's own "Giant Killer" Melissa Kerr for creating the awesome music playlist to CXLV.

The Match: Kevin Adams defeated Michael Edwards, 6 - 0.
Captains Statistics: Kevin Adams 9-2-0 / Michael Edwards 5-1-1. Adams became the first player in history to reach nine victories as captain, breaking the record of eight which he himself set at CX1. Edwards suffered his first career captains defeat, having kept his win streak for nearly a year and half.

Attendance: 36, comprised of 30 men and 6 women. This was the 11th highest attendance in ECD history. This was the first time since DODGEBALL CX last Fall where 30 or more male competitors were present.
New Players: Tyler Hetzel, Conor Mulholland, Zac Kent, Matthew Kent, Dillon Luis, Jared Luis, Justin Herbert, Cameron Schroeder, Haley Schroeder.
